content: I would like to remind everyone that certain statements made during this conference call are forward-looking, including statements about Bionanoâs strategic and commercialization plan, sales pipeline, future fundraising activities and prospects, anticipated benefits or improvements to the Saphyr System and Ionic Purification System, goals and anticipated milestones for 2023, an achievement of our Elevate growth strategy, our anticipated compound annual growth rate, the size and our ability to access our estimated target market, the advantage of the Saphyr System and Ionic Purification System of our current technologies, the anticipated benefits of recent acquisitions, expectations regarding timing and content of study results and anticipated benefits of these studies in driving adoption of the Saphyr System and Ionic Purification System.
